divs: Sighting DetailsHeard dog barking, we went outside and noticed an aircraft to the north eastnear mountains.It was a triangle with 3 circleish lights near each angle. It wascompletely silent, thats what was really wierd and it stood motionless in theair without any wobbling etc. Maybe it was some test aircraft since theres asecret base to the north of me.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around December 13th 2003
